targetLine.text: Well, she did have quite a scare, right? After all, Miss Clayton almost ended up at the bottom of Clayton Ravine.
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part III

contextBefore.text: C'mon, Doc, did you see the way she was looking at you?

contextAfter.text: Holy shit! Hey Doc! Clayton Ravine was named after a teacher.
A hundred years ago?!? That's this year!
Every kid in school knows that story because we all have teachers we'd like to see fall into the ravine.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
